statements: DELETE FROM project_schedule WHERE project_id = 100 AND start_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM project_schedule WHERE milestone = 'Final Review' AND end_date < '2023-12-31';
DELETE FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND status = 'Completed'
DELETE FROM milestones WHERE project_id = 1 AND milestone_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM deadlines WHERE description LIKE '%important%' AND deadline_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-30';
DELETE FROM schedule WHERE project_id = 2 AND task_name = 'Task 1';
